Plot: A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.
Title: Point Break
Writer: Kurt Wimmer (screenplay), Rick King (story), W. Peter Iliff (story), Kurt Wimmer (story), W. Peter Iliff, Rick King, W. Peter Iliff
Country: China, Germany, USA, Austria, Italy, Canada
Actors: Edgar Ramírez, Luke Bracey, Ray Winstone, Teresa Palmer
